item.description:
It's time for the next Image Makers shoot

It will be an outdoor location shoot on Saturday June 27th at the Mary O'Malley Park at Admirals Hill Commandants Way, Chelsea.

Bill Downey will be the creative director.

The cost will be $20 per photographer. Models will sign a release and photographers will provide everyone who participates with low-resolution digital copies of their images.
Makeup artist will begin on the models at 11:30pm everyone else must arrive by 1pm

This shoot is limited to 10 photographers.

The Image makers is a subgroup of the Boston Fashion Industry Meetup. We currently have 38 members consisting of models, makeup artist, photographers, stylist and designers and fashion writers.
Our first meeting and shoot was on January 24th at Positive Image studio. Since it was the first meeting we spent about 2 hours talking and defining our mission then we had a shoot with models Hui and Jo-Jo. The models wore their own clothes and did their own makeup. During the first meeting we decided that the format for this group would be a photo shoot about every month with one person volunteering as the creative director for the shoot.

The second meeting/shoot was Feb 28th on location at a contemporary house. We spent a short amount of time talking and several hours shooting. This was a very well organized fashion shoot with excellent team effort. Clothes were provided by Designers: Olivia Chow, Elena Gorczyca and the Suneri Boutique. Models were Beata, Hui, and Lidia. Styling was by Olivia Chow and Olivia Kostigen.
The 3rd shoot was at covershot studios in Lawrence. There were about 10 shooters and 6 models. Designers were Mary Colburn and Sherry Dwivedi. See some of the photos here http://fashion.meetup...

More info will be posted as the shoot concept and casting develop.

Email me ron@positiveimage-boston.com or Bill Downey (planewriting@yahoo.com) if you want to participate in this shoot and donâ€™t forget to rsvp here.
item.name: Image Makers June outdoor location shoot.
